TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableCellCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class TableCellCollection Implements IList
public ref class TableCellCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type TableCellCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装 和 对象的集合，这些对象组成了 控件中的一行。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of and objects that make up a row in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类以编程方式管理组成 控件中的行的对象的集合。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that make up a row in a control. 此类通常用于在控件中的行中添加或删除单元。This class is commonly used to add or remove cells from a row in a control. > [!NOTE] > 控件包含一个 集合 , 该集合表示对象的集合。 A control contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 每个都表示表中的单个行并包含一个表示对象集合的集合。Each represents an individual row in the table and contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 这些对象表示表中的单个单元格。These objects represent the individual cells in the table. 若要获取单个单元格, 你必须首先 从控件的集合中获取。To get an individual cell, you must first get a from the collection of a control. 然后, 可以 从的集合中获取。You can then get a from the collection of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式填充控件。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically fill a control. 对象 (表示单个单元格) 添加到对象中, 这些对象表示各个行 ( 通过属性)。 objects, which represent individual cells, are added to objects, which represent the individual rows, through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableCellCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableCellCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将指定数组中的对象追加到集合中。 Use the method to append the objects from the specified array to the collection. 构造表的行时, 通常使用此方法。This method is commonly used when you are constructing a row of a table. 若要构造表的行, 请首先创建一个对象数组来表示该行的单元格。To construct a row of a table, first create an array of objects to represent the cells of the row. 接下来, 使用方法, 将数组作为参数传递, 将对象添加到集合中。Next, use the method, passing the array as an argument, to add the objects to the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法将对象从数组添加到。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to add the objects from an array to a . 请注意, 在此示例中 , 的属性是类的实例。Note that in the example, the property of the is an instance of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以 从中移除所有对象, 并将属性设置为0。Use this method to remove all objects from the and set the property to 0. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将从中移除对象, 但不会从控件中移除。This method removes the objects from the , but it does not remove the from the control. 如果要完全删除表中的行, 则还要确保删除。Be sure to also remove the if you want to completely remove a row from the table. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法从表的中间行中移除所有对象, 并将其替换为新的对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all objects from the center row of the table and replace them with new objects. returns.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含 内的所有 对象。

span.span: A implemented object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建一个已实现的对象, 该对象可循环访问以获取中的每一项。Use this method to create a implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the . 使用属性可获取集合中当前指向的项。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法可将枚举数移回初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 在创建已实现的 对象之后或使用方法将枚举器移动到集合中的第一项之后, 必须调用方法。The method must be called after creating a implemented object or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则, 由属性表示的项是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法创建实现的对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a implemented object. 然后循环访问该对象以显示所选行中的项。It is then iterated through to display the items in the selected row.
